Dear RADIANCE community,


We are pleased to launch the website of the 13th International RADIANCE
workshop to be hosted in London 1st till 3rd September 2014.


London Metropolitan University in partnership with Arup will be hosting the
workshop at the headquarters office of Arup and a LondonMet University
building.


http://nceub.org.uk/ocs/index.php/radiance/radiance2014


Please have a look at the information published and create a user account
to receive further updates and announcements specifically related to this
Workshop.
This user account will also allow you to upload an abstract if you wish to
make a presentation at the workshop. You are also welcome to just attend
and learn more about RADIANCE and its latest developments.
You can register and make the fee payment at a later date.


With a long tradition of gathering academics, consultants and anyone
interested in lighting related subjects using Radiance software, this event
is a great opportunity to learn and discuss ideas. Hope you are able to
participate at this RADIANCE International Workshop.


Best regards,
Luisa and Francesco
13th International RADIANCE Workshop Organisers
